metadata.title: Polaroid V - Shaped Dual Camera & Camcorder Bracket With 2 Standard Shoe Mounts (Attach At Same Time Microphones, Lights, Flash, Monitors etc) For The Panasonic Lumix DMC-G3, DMC-GF3, DMC-G1, DMC-GH1, DMC-GH2, DMC-GH3, DMC-GH4, DMC-L10, DMC-GF1, DMC-GF2, DMC-G10, DMC-G2, DMC-GF3, DMC-G3, DMC-GF5, DMC-G5, DMC-GF6, DMC-G6, DMC-GX7, DMC-GM1 Digital SLR Cameras
features: Attaches Easily To Any Cameras OR Camcorders Shoe Mount
1/4" Thread Attachment Allows You To Mount It On Standard Light Stands & Tripods
description: If you have ever wished for an extra hand to help you accomplish the setup for a perfect picture, wish no more. With the Polaroid V shaped bracket, you can easily mount any combination of items to your cameras accessory shoe. Add an additional scene filling light with two lighting units or mount a video light with a microphone, perhaps a video monitor and a microphone, or two flashes etc. Mix or match whatever accessories you need without an assistant, without tripods. Youâ€™re free to move about with all the equipment you need to capture pictures with technical creativity.
